roleset.name: establish a value, again

example.name: one arg
example.text: South Korean President Roh Tae Woo, brushing aside suggestions that the won be revalued [*]again, said the currency's current level against the dollar is ``appropriate.''

example.name: ARG0 and ARG2
example.text: the seller had revalued it at $18

roleset.note: REVALUE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'revalue' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from revalue.01-v predicate notes)
